description:
One of Yusuke’s teammates has been badly injured, and Kuwabara insists on fighting the next enemy all by himself. Before the bickering group can disagree, a roar slices through the castle – the second Saint Beast is set to attack!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le combat de Kuwabara et son Épée Astrale
Nobi yo Reiken! Kuwabara: Otoko no Shoubu
Vino, sabie spirituală! Lupta lui Kuwabara!
伸びよ霊剣! 桑原・男の勝負
